types.html:
achour m (plural achours)

  1. (Islam) ushr, a tax paid to a sultan (especially in Morocco)
  2. an Algerian government tax (in French colonial times)
    • 1854, Edmond Pellissier de Reynaud, Annales algériennes‎[1], volume 2, Paris: J. Dumain, page 287:
      On sait que l'achour est la dîme prélevée sur les récoltes.
      We know that the achour is the tax collected on harvests.
trans: ushr, a tax paid to a sultan
